title: CATEGORY 1 CME CREDIT Perceived Workplace Health and Safety Climates: Associations With Worker Outcomes and Productivity

sections.text:
1. Discuss the effect of workplace climate on worker health behaviors (i.e., alcohol use, nutrition, physical activity, sleep, and tobacco use) and worker outcomes (i.e., abuse, back pain, depression, job satisfaction, life satisfaction, selfperceived general health), and be able to answer the question, for which behaviors and outcomes were statistically significant associations observed?

2. State the effect of workplace climate on employer outcomes (i.e., worker productivity).

3. Describe the application of a conceptual model in exploring complex pathways to worker well-being.
